content.en: Decision-making algorithms: Researchers have been investigating the capabilities of computational algorithms in decision-making processes. They have explored various techniques such as Multi-Attribute Value Theory (MAVT), Analytical Hierarchy Process (AHP), Percentaging, Technique for Order Preference by Similarity to Ideal Solution (TOPSIS), Fuzzy algorithm, Simple additive rating (SAR), Simple additive weighting (SAW), PROMETHEE, and Multi-objective optimization. These algorithms aim to improve consistency, handle complex cases, achieve group consensus, and reduce inconsistencies in decision-making.
content.da: Beslutningsalgoritmer: Forskere har undersøgt kapaciteterne af beregningsalgoritmer i beslutningsprocesser. De har udforsket forskellige teknikker såsom Multi-Attribute Value Theory (MAVT), Analytical Hierarchy Process (AHP), Percentaging, Technique for Order Preference by Similarity to Ideal Solution (TOPSIS), Fuzzy algoritme, Simple additive rating (SAR), Simple additive weighting (SAW), PROMETHEE, og Multi-objective optimization. Disse algoritmer sigter mod at forbedre konsistensen, håndtere komplekse sager, opnå gruppe-konsensus og reducere inkonsistenser i beslutningstagning.
